kv5.9:2.3_0: Tena phassena taṁ phassaṁ phusati, tāya vedanāya taṁ vedanaṁ vedeti, tāya saññāya
kv5.9:2.3_1: taṁ saññaṁ sañjānāti, tāya cetanāya taṁ cetanaṁ ceteti, tena cittena taṁ cittaṁ cinteti,
kv5.9:2.3_2: tena vitakkena taṁ vitakkaṁ vitakketi, tena vicārena taṁ vicāraṁ vicāreti, tāya pītiyā
kv5.9:2.3_3: taṁ pītiṁ piyāyati, tāya satiyā taṁ satiṁ sarati, tāya paññāya taṁ paññaṁ pajānāti,
kv5.9:2.3_4: tena khaggena taṁ khaggaṁ chindati, tena pharasunā taṁ pharasuṁ tacchati, tāya kudhāriyā
kv5.9:2.3_5: taṁ kudhāriṁ tacchati, tāya vāsiyā taṁ vāsiṁ tacchati, tāya sūciyā taṁ sūciṁ sibbeti,
kv5.9:2.3_6: tena aṅgulaggena taṁ aṅgulaggaṁ parāmasati, tena nāsikaggena taṁ nāsikaggaṁ parāmasati,
kv5.9:2.3_7: tena matthakena taṁ matthakaṁ parāmasati, tena gūthena taṁ gūthaṁ dhovati, tena muttena
kv5.9:2.3_8: taṁ muttaṁ dhovati, tena kheḷena taṁ kheḷaṁ dhovati, tena pubbena taṁ pubbaṁ dhovati,
kv5.9:3.4: Nanu sabbasaṅkhāre aniccato diṭṭhe tampi ñāṇaṁ aniccato diṭṭhaṁ hotīti?
kv5.9:3.6: Hañci sabbasaṅkhāre aniccato diṭṭhe tampi ñāṇaṁ aniccato diṭṭhaṁ hoti, tena vata re vattabbe—
